text: Kevin Lewis (born 19 September 1940 in Ellesmere Port) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Sheffield United, Liverpool and Huddersfield Town. He also played for Wigan Athletic in the Cheshire League, scoring three goals in eight games. ==References== ==External links== * LFChistory.net player profile * League stats at Neil Brown's site Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ellesmere Port Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Wigan Athletic F.C. players Category:Washington Diplomats (NASL) players Category:English Football League players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Sportspeople from Cheshire Category:Association football midfielders Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:English expatriate footballers
title: Kevin Lewis (footballer, born 1940)
